name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Spy
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Spy
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Spy is an arcade racing game. 

Drive your car through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid army cars .

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING SPY-

- Easy intuitive gameplay! 
- Interesting Story! 
- Lots of Coins to collect! 
- Avoid Collisions with Army cars!  
- Race through exciting tracks! 
- Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

Up to accelerate the vehicle.

Enter to Pause and to Un-Pause the game.
